title: Instrumental variable estimation of the proportional hazards model by presmoothing. (arXiv:2309.02183v1 [econ.EM])
abstract: We consider instrumental variable estimation of the proportional hazards model of Cox (1972). The instrument and the endogenous variable are discrete but there can be (possibly continuous) exogenous covariables. By making a rank invariance assumption, we can reformulate the proportional hazards model into a semiparametric version of the instrumental variable quantile regression model of Chernozhukov and Hansen (2005). A na\"ive estimation approach based on conditional moment conditions generated by the model would lead to a highly nonconvex and nonsmooth objective function. To overcome this problem, we propose a new presmoothing methodology. First, we estimate the model nonparametrically - and show that this nonparametric estimator has a closed-form solution in the leading case of interest of randomized experiments with one-sided noncompliance. translated_title: 通过预平滑实施变量法估计比例风险模型
translated_abstract: 我们考虑使用变量法估计Cox（1972）的比例风险模型。仪器和内生变量是离散的，但可能存在（可能连续的）外生协变量。通过做出秩不变性假设，我们可以将比例风险模型重新表述为Chernozhukov和Hansen（2005）的仪器变量分位数回归模型的半参数化版本。基于该模型生成的条件矩条件的天真估计方法将导致高度非凸和非光滑的目标函数。为了克服这个问题，我们提出了一种新的预平滑方法。首先，我们非参数估计模型，并证明在兴趣的一方向非服从的随机实验领域中，这个非参数估计器有一个封闭形式的解。其次，我们使用非参数估计值生成“代理”观测值，在这些观测值上外生性成立。第三，我们应用通常的部分似然方法。
tldr: 通过引入预平滑方法，我们提出了一种新的仪器变量估计方法，用于求解比例风险模型。这种方法可以克服由于非光滑目标函数引起的挑战。在此方法中，我们首先非参数估计模型，然后使用非参数估计值生成“代理”观测值，最后应用部分似然方法进行估计。
en_tdlr: We propose a new instrumental variable estimation method for solving the proportional hazards model by introducing a presmoothing technique. This method overcomes the challenges posed by nonsmooth objective functions. In this approach, we first nonparametrically estimate the model and then use the nonparametric estimates to generate "proxy" observations, which are used to address the issue of endogeneity. Finally, we apply the partial likelihood method for estimation.
